Hey everyone,

Thought I'd make a smaller plan this time, if you have any suggestions for the next offer I'm all ears.

**Double the data allowance with a ticket after ordering!**

#512MB RAM  
1 vCPU  
512MB RAM  
5GB NVMe Storage  
200GB Data (400GB with double data)  
$4.50 AUD/month (~$3.46 USD)  
[Order Now!](https://billing.flowvps.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=4&promocode=LETCODE2)

Servers are located in Equinix ME1 (Melbourne, Australia).  
Looking glass: http://lg.flowvps.com/

China customers should receive better speeds now that the undersea cable between Australia and Asia is repaired.

Feel free to PM me or ask any questions in this thread.
